Text: Re LNG Contracts Cc Mary Sorry about not getting in touch with you earlier Just checked my email Unfortunately I will be out of Houston this weekend and will be headed back to India Hence i will not be able to meet with you I am looking into the commercial aspect of the LNG contracts and hence would like to discuss your plans Can we still do this over the phone Sorry again about not getting in touch with you Regards Anshuman Mary CT PM To Anshuman SrivastavENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Sally CT Scott CT Subject Re LNG Contracts I would like to visit with you while you are here in Houston You may contact me at x and we can arrange a time to meet Forwarded by Mary SolmonsonHOUECT on PM Heidi NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Mary CT cc Anshuman SrivastavENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Sandeep KatwalaENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re LNG Contracts Mary One of our team members Anshuman Srivastav is currently in Houston It would probably be useful for the of you to meet so that we can understand exactly what your plans are with regards to LNG and what exactly you will require as far as contracts go Failing that the person who is the official keeper of all our contracts is Sandeep Katwala He should be able to get you whatever you need Let me know if you have any difficulties and I can try and hunt stuff down Heidi Mary CT PM To Rick nron Stephen NRON Gautam nron Stephen NRON Heidi HellmannENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Milind LaadENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Love nron cc Subject LNG Contracts Forwarded by Mary SolmonsonHOUECT on PM Mary Solmonson PM To cc Sally CT Scott CT Subject LNG Contracts I am seeking information on where to find copies of LNG Contracts that were previously in the domain of the old Enron International company Enron North America will be establishing a risk book to manage LNG positions on a worldwide basis and we need copies of all contracts to set this up These contracts may or may not be related to the Dabhol project If you can provide guidance or information as to where to find these contracts I would appreciate it You may respond via email or call me at in Houston Thank you for your attention
